concept.title: Recirculatory Heater - Saloon
concept.shortdesc: The heater is used to heat the interior of the vehicle to let you drive in comfort during cold weather. It can also be used to defrost the windshield. The Saloon model has a recirculatory heater which uses the engine to warm and recirculate air inside the vehicle.

conbody.p: The heater works by using hot water from the engine cooling system to warm the air, and uses a blower to circulate the air through the interior of the vehicle.

Use the heater in cold weather to warm and circulate the interior air. You can also use the heater to provide a current of hot air onto the windshield for demisting.The heater blower only operates when the engine is switched on.
There are three controls to operate the heater: a temperature dial, a shutter on the heater unit box and a control valve.
